document_name_accent: ung thu dai trang giai doan 2.json
document_title: Stage 2 colon cancer: Signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Stage 2 colon cancer is cancer that has spread below the muscle layer of the colon and has not spread to lymph nodes or distant parts of the body.
subsection_title: ung thu dai trang giai doan 2.json. What is stage 2 colon cancer?
subsection_data:
ung thu dai trang giai doan 2.json. What is stage 2 colon cancer?
Stage 2 colon cancer is cancer that has spread below the muscle layer of the colon and has not spread to lymph nodes or distant parts of the body.
